main.java.model.mikealgos

Class DownGuardAlgo

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.mikealgos.BaseAlgo
      • main.java.model.mikealgos.GuardAlgo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MikeAlgo

    public class DownGuardAlgo
extends BaseAlgo
    NOT IMPLEMENTED YET. Creates a 'guard' for a given MikePosOrders: If the current ZEROPROFITPOINT is below the current bid price - then it will submit a SELLSTP order in an amount that if filled will move the ZEROPROFITPOINT lower so that it is never touched. The distance between the ZEROPROFITPOINT and the bid price is specified as GUARDBUFFER
